Other good movies - better movies - on the same subject are "Obsession" and "Islam- what the west needs to know".

What is interesting is that the truth about the orthodox Islam religion and goals of the jihadists are slowly coming to mainstream US TV.  The Glenn Beck show is one.  One night I happened to turn on FOX and saw the last 5 minutes of the obsession movie.

This is a very important world wide problem.  Orthodox Muslims want to emulate Mohammad and conquer the world and force the planet's inhabitants to convert to Islam or die.  They want to setup islamofacist governments like Iran has and Afganistan had.  Islam is not just a religion - it is not just something done in private and in church - it is a body of laws - sharia law - and a system of government.  The radicals want to emulate Mohammad and make jihad on the west, whereas the peaceful ones want to move into a country, multiply like rabbits, and vote to change constitutions to institute sharia law and their system of government.

What nobody is talking about is what to do about the problem.  This is likely because it is not politically correct to talk about the solutions.  I think one solution is to end all legal immigration - only because we can't discriminate against only Muslim immigrants.  They are here to hopefully multiply enough to destroy our government and legal system.  Let's not let any more in.  Also crack down on illegal immigration - and change the system so a baby born from illegal immigrants is not automatically a citizen.  Find all the illegal immigrants - imprison them for 10 years - then export them back to their nation of origin.
